title: Owner Acquisition Specialist (Community Growth & Employer Recruitment)
job_overview:
Company:
Yaya & Driver
Connecting families with trusted household help and private drivers — faster, safer, smarter.
Location:
Remote / Field-based (Philippines)
Position Type:
Full-Time (?25,000 base + performance bonuses)

About the Role:
We’re looking for a driven, people-savvy Owner Acquisition Specialist to help us grow the demand side of our platform — families, parents, and employers who need reliable yayas (nannies) or drivers. Your mission is to get verified households to sign up, engage with, and hire through the Yaya & Driver app.
This is a high-impact role at the front line of our growth engine. You’ll be actively recruiting new users by tapping into online communities, building referral programs, engaging parent groups, and running localized outreach campaigns.

Key Responsibilities:
• ? Recruit new verified owners (households, employers) to the platform
• ???? Post in relevant Facebook/WhatsApp/Viber groups, parenting communities, and expat forums
• ???? Partner with barangays, village admins, clinics, schools, and family-focused businesses
• ???? Track and report daily/weekly metrics: sign-ups, conversion rates, hires
• ???? Collect feedback from new users to improve onboarding and user experience
• ???? Support owners through onboarding: guide them on how to post jobs, shortlist, and connect with workers

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):
• Minimum 200 verified owner sign-ups/month (baseline)
• Bonus tiers for hitting 300, 400, 500 verified sign-ups
• Engagement metrics (logins, shortlist actions, hires initiated

What We’re Looking For:
• Strong communication and persuasion skills (Tagalog and English)
• Familiar with Facebook groups, parenting circles, or barangay-level networking
• Confident in doing outreach — both online and in-person
• Highly organized with ability to hit daily/weekly targets
• Experience in marketing, sales, community outreach, or customer support is a plus
• Self-motivated, fast learner, and mission-driven

What We Offer:
• ?25,000 monthly base salary
• Performance bonuses up to ?10,000/month
• Flexible work hours (results-driven)
• A fast-paced, supportive startup environment
• Opportunity to grow into a team leader or marketing lead role

How to Apply:
Send your CV and a short voice or video note (optional) sharing:
1. Why you're excited about helping families find yayas or drivers.
2. Any experience you have with online community engagement or outreach.
